wikipedia_page.main: Kenny Milne (born 1 December 1961 in Edinburgh, Scotland) is a former Scotland international rugby union player who was capped 39 times. He was also a British & Irish Lion, touring in 1993.

link_mentions.page: 1993 British Lions tour to New Zealand

response: * Kenny Milne (39 caps for Scotland, 1993 British and Irish Lions)
